price: "Zato požurite Allahu, ja sam vam Njegov upozoritelj jasni!
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
